      • createClient

        public static RClient createClient(java.lang.String deployrUrl,
                                   int concurrentCallLimit)
                            throws RClientException,
                                   RSecurityException
        Create connection at the specified DeployR URL.

        Concurrent call limit defaults to 200.

        Parameters:
        deployrUrl - url address of DeployR Server
        concurrentCallLimit - beyond which DeployR API calls are queued for execution
        Returns:
        RClient
        Throws:
        RClientException
        RSecurityException

      • createClient

        public static RClient createClient(java.lang.String deployrUrl,
                                   boolean allowSelfSignedSSLCert)
                            throws RClientException,
                                   RSecurityException
        Create connection at the specified DeployR URL.
        Parameters:
        deployrUrl - url address of DeployR Server
        allowSelfSignedSSLCert - when enabled, HTTPS connections using self-signed SSL certs are permitted
        Returns:
        RClient
        Throws:
        RClientException
        RSecurityException

                                   int concurrentCallLimit,

                            throws RClientException,
                                   RSecurityException
        Create connection at the specified DeployR URL.
        Parameters:
        deployrUrl - url address of DeployR Server
        concurrentCallLimit - beyond which DeployR API calls are queued for execution
        allowSelfSignedSSLCert - when enabled, HTTPS connections using self-signed SSL certs are permitted
        Returns:
        RClient
        Throws:
        RClientException
        RSecurityException
